content: In order to print, we invoke the println(). This is an instance method from java.io.PrintStream, which is the type of the static field out in the class java.lang.System. The Java VM binds System.out to the standard output stream when it starts a program.
stemmed: In order print , invok println ( ) . thi instanc method java.io.printstream , type static field class java.lang.system . the java VM bind system.out standard output stream start program .
